roleset.name: make a ki-yi-ing sound, like a dog (?)

example.name: Brown example
example.text: Finally, all I needed was to throw a little piece of red wood that looked like a firecracker and [that dumb dog]-1 would run *trace*-1 ki-yi-ing for his life.

roleset.note: KIYI-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on Brown-batch-3. Member of Vncls animal_sounds-38. Comparison to 'mew'. (from kiyi.01-v)
